Title: Relates to out-of-state investigations and warrants regarding abortions performed in this state
Summary: Prohibits issuance of certain search warrants relating to out-of-state investigations of abortion services provided in NYS; prohibits corporations domiciled in NYS from complying with certain out-of-state search warrants regarding abortion services provided in NYS; makes related provisions prohibiting cooperation with certain investigations into abortion services provided in NYS.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law and the executive law, in relation to out-of-state investigations and warrants regarding abortions performed in New York state
